alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 02 at 4:27AM CST until February 03 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow continuing. Additional accumulations of 1 to 2 inches possible. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Platte, Goshen and eastern Laramie Counties including Bordeaux, Wheatland, Torrington, and Pine Bluffs. In Nebraska, Sioux, Scotts Bluff, Banner, Kimball, and Cheyenne Counties including Scottsbluff, Harrisburg, Kimball, and Sidney. * WHEN...Until 2 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions possible due to slick, snow covered roads and reduced visibilities.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
